website_summaries.verdict: A surface mounted cabinet with textured glass doors. An elegant storage solution for most bathrooms.
pros: An attractive cabinet accompanied with quality hardware
We love how easy it is to install, with pre-hung doors and door magnet
cons: Pilot holes not fully drilled in some cases

customer_reviews.title: Description a bit deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: This is a challenging review to write. The product is probably a 4 star product. But the description is a 2 star description. I was specifically looking for a piece that was put together already. The description states minimal assembly required. It needs full assembly using screws, cam locks, glue,etc. Once you get it put together, it is great. The instructions were also some of the best I've followed for put together furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jacie M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet, love the color
customer_reviews.text: DESCRIPTION IS INCORRECT- THIS IS A HUGE CABINET!!!!! Beautiful cabinet, love the color, well made..... that being said.....Measurements are wrong!!! Measures 5-1/2 by 18-1/2 by 18-1/2 inches <---- THIS IS INCORRECT!!! The length is 24 1/2 inches not 18 1/2. Now I have to waste my time and gas returning a product that was misrepresented. I searched for this product by the dimensions and this came up in my search. it irks me to no end when the product received is not what the description states.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price n took about thirty minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: f'real

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a really nice cabinet. You have to put it together but its engineered very precisely and went together perfectly. I added carpenter glue to the dowls but that's just me. Once together it is very solid and attractive. The color perfectly matches the espresso medicine cabinet and sink cabinet that I got at the big stores. This item was shipped quickly and was well packaged and arrived in perfect shape. It was easy to put together and probably only took a half hour or so....but for someone not used to putting these kinds of items together I could see it taking up to an hour. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GPinNC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Little Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: well made - went together very easily. Just be sure to follow the instructions carefully and completely. There were no missing or ill-fitting parts or hardware; took about 20 minutes to assemble. I'm biased towards the 5-star rating because it matched the espresso cabinetry already in the guest bathroom. Works perfect installed over the commode. The panels are actual glass too, not plastic (well, oughtta be for the cost). All the lines are straight; pretty solid piece when assembled correctly. Doors move and latch just fine. Glad we found it - I was afraid i was gonna have to pay more for an already-made cabinet that would have needed painting to match it with the rest.
customer_reviews.author: StarvinMarvin

customer_reviews.title: Doors are slightly uneven, enough to notice.
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty cabinet but the doors are uneven. I will try to fix the problem or return it, I haven't decided.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: A couple issues, but still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet. Gave high rating even though needed to do follow-up as missing two small hardware pieces. Can't believe, as well as this things we packaged that both door glass pieces were cracked. It was so well packed I didn't open the inner box glass containing doors until I had everything else put together. Well designed cabinet. I look forward to getting last two hardware pieces and two glass doors to replace the doors arrived broken. Still recommend this cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: DDC80910

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs better engineering
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and easy to put together, but not all of the hardware was very robust. And resulted in having to get creative with the cam locks, which are pretty important, 1 broke when securing the post the others were a little sketchy. Beyond that it was fairly simple and straight forward. It looks great and it does the job it is intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Napieraj

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty. It was fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. It was fairly easy to put together. I wrestled with 3 or 4 stars. It really looks nice. What I don't like is the smell. It has a strong wood smell. Now things in it don't pick up the smell (I'm surprised), but it's still unpleasant! I've left it open a lot to air out for a few hours here & there or when we were all gone for the day. It hasn't helped. We were gone a week & I left it open the entire time we were gone to air out. Asthma is a factor in my home, but maybe I'll Febreeze it when we're going to be gone a while again.
customer_reviews.author: Shella

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic but it arrived with a broken glass door
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic but it arrived with a broken glass door,the parts didn't line up. The screws are so cheap the head broke right off so the screw was stuck inside and no way to get it out. If you drilled it out then you had no way of putting another screw in that spot. Amazon sent me a new one then I took the pieces I needed from it and make it work and sent back the damaged parts. The handles don't line up either like mentioned on here before. In the end VERY VERY cheap but looks real nice.
customer_reviews.author: AndyMan517

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. There are only TWO screws to attach it to the wall. Which I feel is ridiculous. I added 4 more additional screws, and it feels secure now. The doors do not align correctly when closed. I think one of them a bit warped. They still function fine, its just annoying to see this has the item is brand new out of the box...
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf! Easy to assemble. High quality
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is awesome! High quality for the price Super easy to assemble (I assembled it with my 6 year old in less than an hour) Everything is labeled extremely well, down to the wooden dowels Super easy to get up on the wall Looks great and fits our needs
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chonkworld

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's a very classic simple style that would look great in any bath room. We have a smaller bathroom and this fits perfectly on the wall behind the door, yet still allows us to open the door fully (we are using a small rubber stopper to keep the door from hitting it). The shelves are very deep and allow for a lot of storage. They are also fairly tall but don't fit everything, a can of shaving cream fits easily, but a large bottle of contact solution is slightly too tall. We like it so much we might order another for a different bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: not perfect but still a decent buy
customer_reviews.text: I overall am very happy with this cabinet. It's stylish and it's roomy enough for our needs. We did choose to reinforce the back of it to the wall for hanging it without fear of it falling. 1 thing I didn't like about this item was there is a gap of space between the 2 cabinet doors when closed and from the bottom ledge of the shelves and the bottom edge of the doors when closed as well. It's noticeable once you do notice it for us it's not a deal breaker though and I doubt that any company over would even notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the product myself until I went to hang it then I had my husband help. It could be hung by one person, but it was easier to have him hold it. It does come with a marked paper that allows you to know exactly where to drill the holes into the wall which is great! It was simple to put together, looks beautiful, and the adjustable shelves don't slide around (grooves keep them in place securely). The pictures don't do the glass justice. It really is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You really get what you paid for and some.
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful black wall cabinet. Exactly what I was looking for. It arrived as described. Easy installation and great instructions. As one reviewer had stated don’t tighten the screws all the way while assembling. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: a chic-looking cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little cabinet, especially for the price. Love the deep rich wood color and the patterned glass doors. It only took an hour to put together, and the assembly went without a hitch. The only small drawback I see is with the clear glass--it's patterned, but you still very clearly can see all the stuff on the shelves behind it, the various tubes and bottles and boxes.. But i added some frosted contact paper on the inside, and now it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: AmyA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cabinet! Not top of the line but definitely worth the money. It was easy to assemble. I painted a 12x24 shelf to match the cabinet and attached it to the top so I could stack bath towels on top and painted a small shelf to match that I hung underneath for wash cloths and extra T.P. Lots of storage for a tiny bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: bathroom cabinet
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL . even more beautiful than i expected. i redid my bathroom and needed a black cabinet. i love this one. i get compliments on it all the time. And cant go wrong for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We are fairly handy, but this cabinet went together easily. We had no trouble with the instructions, they are far better than many we have seen. For a $60 cabinet this is a bargain. It is well made, square, closes perfectly - thoughtfully designed. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cabinet with lovely glass doors. Mine arrived in great condition, no scratches or dings. It’s my real wood, but it is high quality. We used our own hardware to hang it just to be sure it wasn’t going anywhere. Surprisingly it has lots of space for storage. We fit all our medicines, supplements, toilet paper, and feminine products inside easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna A. Slaby

customer_reviews.title: ... wall in your bathroom and the frosted glass is nice so guests can't readily see your various creams
customer_reviews.text: It fit wells on that odd wall in your bathroom and the frosted glass is nice so guests can't readily see your various creams, potions, and unguents. Just be prepared to dedicate the better part of an afternoon to assembling and hanging it. I'd happily pay 50% more if it came put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly as advertised. I received what I ordered; no surprises !
customer_reviews.text: Great small cabinet for bathroom to store about anything. We use it for wash clothes and hand towels. Easy to assemble and mount on the wall. Fits our decor well. - HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and looks really cute in our bathroom. I would have given it 5 stars if it had included all the hardware. It was missing the pieces we needed to finish assembling it. Amazon was awesome to work with though. They refunded the about we need to purchase the pieces at our local hardware store. Like some of the comments we read when purchasing it said, it's not very deep, but we think it's perfect in our small bathroom and to go over a toilet. I would definitely recommend this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: k rem

customer_reviews.title: ... recently opened up a tattoo parlor and this was perfect to store my inks in
customer_reviews.text: I recently opened up a tattoo parlor and this was perfect to store my inks in. Also cheaper than other companies who carried it. I ended up painting it black to match my decor but regardless, an easy to build quality product for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Decent cabinet. Bought for my bedroom. Amazon item description lists product as black but it’s clearly dark brown. That is the only negative thing I have to say about it. It’s big and perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So much room in it too
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So much room in it too! Ordered the smaller version for a medicine cabinet and liked the way it looked so much we ordered this one for above the toilet. Love the glass doors, did change the knobs to a brushed nickel to go with the towel bars.
customer_reviews.author: MOMof3

customer_reviews.title: Pretty low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty low quality product. Followed install instructions and hardware split through finish in 6 locations. Installed like I was handling eggshells and still managed to damage the item. I can't imagine this lasting more than a year before it warps and falls apart. I'd say it was a total waste of $65.
customer_reviews.author: kathe cohagen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great as a medicine cabinet in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Looks great as a medicine cabinet in my bathroom, much like more expensive ones. I admit I don't like putting things together and this does require assembly, but the instructions were clear and all the parts were there. It took about an hour. Please let me know if you found this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: ginsing

customer_reviews.title: Good size but not strong enough to hold heavy stuff unless you use extra nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on reviews. The look is nice, the color is nice. My contractor put it together in an hour. Before putting it up he showed me that the box is configured to be nailed in only at the top (where there is an extra strip of wood at the back). And neither of us thought that would be enough to keep it on the wall safely. So he also put in 3 extra nails at the bottom. It is up but I would not put too much stuff in it - light stuff like qtips, toothpaste, plastic bottles of medicine, etc. - no shampoos, creams, etc. unless they are small in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty cabinet. 3 star because there was a scratch at the top and also the doors are not aligned. I would return it but wont go to the effort of disassembling, putting it back in the box and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is good, but-this was advertised as having only damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, but-this was advertised as having only damaged packaging. In putting it together it became clear that had been a return -someone started putting it together-even gluing in some of the dowel pins. There were several scrapes on the surface-the worst being right on the front of one of the doors. Also, there was a crack in the back piece. Too much time invested to take it apart and return, but very disappointed. Hoping a black marker will cover the scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Val Larson

customer_reviews.title: Not 8 inches deep
customer_reviews.text: This is not a well made cabinet, however it looks good! It is only 6 inches deep, not hard to put together but 1 piece of hardware was missing and 2 pieces broke during tightening. Don't over tighten screws!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Burtt

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet has a lot of room in it for all your medicine needs and the shelves are adjustable. It came packed very nicely and the directions were easy to follow for assembly. The frosted glass doors gives it an elegant touch and looks beautiful on our wall. If I ever had the need to, I would purchase this product again and would recommend it highly to anyone needing a medicine cabinet that is not only functional to hold a lot of stuff, but looks beautiful on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Pearcy

customer_reviews.title: Wall cabinet, inexpensive, elegant
customer_reviews.text: As advertised medicine, et al, wall chest. Easy to assemble on a CLEAN, SPACIOUS, table. Only problem is mounting the small hinge screws by big, stubby fingers. When finished, ELEGANT.
customer_reviews.author: Archimedes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a cabinet that was elegant, yet affordable. We fell in love when we first saw it! The original website we tried did not have it in stock. We went to a store and they did not have the black in stock. Finally, he recommended that we try Amazon and the rest was history! This cabinet does not disappoint; very elegant and fits perfectly in our bathroom! You will not be disappointed; this cabinet is a "must-have."
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good looking cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cabinet I'm super happy with it. Luckily my brother was able to put this together for me. I know that he said that he had to drill some holes because the cabinet was missing holes for the pulls. It is really pretty and sturdy with plenty of room for all kinds of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: WndWest

customer_reviews.title: a very good-looking piece at a very good price. The glass doors are a very nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Magnet could be stronger, and doors are slightly "off", though not enough to really be noticeable. Overall though, a very good-looking piece at a very good price. The glass doors are a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality cabinet. I would recommend that you get some extra support brackets in case you have a house like mine where the width of the cabinet doesn't make it into the studs. Cabinet was about 1 inch short of the second stud so I had to reinforce the right side. Easy fix just a recommendation. Other than that plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on this cabinet I just couldn't pass up the hype! Well, it is absolutely perfect!!! This isn't cheaply made and worth every penny. You won't be disappointed with this cabinet. I've gotten so many compliments on it and have been asked by many where I purchased it from. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: turnfrederick

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom Storage unit
customer_reviews.text: It comes completely apart so you have to put it together from A thru Z , you need a flat head and Phillips screw driver. It took me about 1:45 minutes. It comes with complete instructions. It helps if you lay everything out first in order by parts. It truly was worth it ! I saved about $100 dollars by doing it myself. The price at Home Depot and Lowe's was about $200. and they don't have the dark colors
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice bathroom storage
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive cabinet that provides bathroom storage at shoulder height. No more digging under the bathroom sink for things. It is heavy so plan on having two people hang it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Starry Night

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cabinet, matches the floor cabinet nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Matches my floor cabinet nicely and finishes the bathroom. Now I finally have storage! there is a small gap between the doors so make sure you feel ok with that before you order. The glass is not see through but its pretty obvious what is in your cabinet so if you plan to use this for a bathroom that lots of people use, make sure to not keep anything crazy in there.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: it seemed to be a nice cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it twice and it arrived with the glass broken both times. One also arrived with the hinges on the wrong side. Other than that, it seemed to be a nice cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Several of the pieces showed up damaged. The box that it was packaged in was not damaged at all so the pieces must have been damaged prior to packaging.
customer_reviews.author: NovelAG

customer_reviews.title: I love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet! It only took me about an hour to put together. Make sure you lay your parts out in front of you before beginning and it will go very quickly. My only problem was that the screws for the knobs are too short to connect through the door so I will have to purchase new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Christie C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cabinet I've found that I liked and would fit perfectly in the space available in the main bathroom. I have an old house and the bathrooms are small, compact space with almost no storage available. This cabinet will solve part of the problem and looks nice, too. I will, of course, have to paint it white, but that's an easy fix to a difficult problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the waffle glass!
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was very easy to put together. Lots of parts, but they were clearly labled and easy to find. They even had a stencil to help you place the anchors into the wall perfectly. You can't ask for better than that! Really good quality item and looks more expensive than what I paid for it. The waffle design on the glass really compliments the piece and is unique. Very happy with this product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Melly Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this item!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of "knock down" furniture but for the price I was willing to give this item a try. I was very surprised and pleased at the ease of assembly and the quality of the cuts, the material, the finish etc. All we did was change the door pulls to match the décor in the rest of the bathroom and it looks great. I am very happy with this purchase. I am also not one to issue five stars but this was earned.
customer_reviews.author: Droopy Dog

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is very attractive in my bathroom and is very roomy inside. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet as described. I was hesitant about the plastic front panels but final look is good. Cabinet adds convenient storage for small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: dkay

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size and looks so nice in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and looks so nice in our bathroom! I wasn't sure if it would look cheap in person, but this is nicer than the ones we saw in the stores and for much, much cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: AE79

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but had some faulty construction
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice but some of the metal pieces that lock the sides and top in place do not match up properly and fall off. I bought the floor cabinet version of this with no issues. I may have gotten a defective one. I plan on keeping it but it needs to be screwed together or glued.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery or Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good in every place except the plastic bits of ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good in every place except the plastic bits of the doors have obvious glue marks where they weren't as careful as they could have been assembling them.
customer_reviews.author: Aegir

customer_reviews.title: Quality cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We love this cabinet! Went together easily, has a beautiful finish, and provides great looking storage!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. The rear wall-facing piece had been slightly crushed in. Nothing too terribly visible and didn't compromise the structural integrity, but still damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gravelle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for over my commode in the bathroom after redecorating. I needed a medicine cabinet but wanted something stylish and different. This is beautiful and I am proud to put it in my new bathroom..
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. The price was right and the cabinet is beautiful. I do not mind that the doors are transparent. It gives the room more light and brings interest to the cabinet. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great value in my opinion....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bathroom cabinet for the money. It was very easy to assemble and comes with everything you need with the exception of philips screw driver. I would recommend this cabinate to anyone that’s interested in the style and color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A Cerna

customer_reviews.title: I would have usually said "oh this is too difficult for me" but really this was easy! It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My first project I put together by myself! I would have usually said "oh this is too difficult for me" but really this was easy! It's very sturdy, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to the Bathroom and EASY assembly
customer_reviews.text: This really dresses up my bathroom and it was the best priced cabinet I could find in the espresso finish. This is a nice quality piec-no cheap particle board, no cardboard backing. This was also the easiest cabinet I have ever put together. Everything is clearly labeled and the instructions are super simple to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Wanted finish to complement dark brown and black alike. Very nice color and finish. Glass doors add style to typically boring bathroom cabinets. It has 2 adjustable shelves. Packaged extremely well, arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: looks great. exactly what I was looking for but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I was looking for a great black cabinet to go with my new bathroom remodel. That's right I said it, black. This cabinet claims to be expresso but you can barely make out the brown. So I'm calling it black. Pros: looks great Easy to put together Good price point Cons: Due to its packaging, the pieces arrived with dings and scuffs. Holes do not all ign very well compared to other assemble yourself products
customer_reviews.author: dyeimpy19

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price assembly is standard for these import ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price assembly is standard for these import items finished product is very nice. I put 2 antique Chinese brass pulls on it and now it looks custom. Chinese pulls are here on Amazon look for "Chinese Medicine Cabinet Pulls set of 2 about $10.00
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: This is really pretty. A bit cheaply made but for the purposes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty. A bit cheaply made but for the purposes that I'm using it for, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Black

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love with this cabinet and got it for our tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this cabinet and got it for our tiny bathroom. Color of the wood is so elegant. And glass makes it look modern but yet it is not looking cold. Very sturdy construction! Assemble took my husband about 20-30 mins. My bathroom looks much better with this set.
customer_reviews.author: 21w

customer_reviews.title: not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: It went together pretty easy I like that it had glue and covers for screw sets. Matched my existing vanity. My gf likes it so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: tpop33

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchase. Warning however, one of the cams burst through the side and I had to repair the finish. I am not sure how this happened but it may have been a flaw in the cam because it did not want to lock in place. Engage them with care.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Trader

customer_reviews.title: Just like the name states
customer_reviews.text: Just like the name states: Elegant! Aesthetically pleasing and plenty of storage instead of a "medicine cabinet/mirror" combo. Easy to assemble and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was expecting, but this product wasn't all that. It's of decent quality, but I don't know how long it will last. It looks nice on the wall and I'll just make sure I treat it gingerly so it won't fall apart. The price was cheap so I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Strong
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Strong, sturdy, pretty. Easy to put together and hang on the wall. U need two people to hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: A good product to buy Very nice and i would buy ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product to buy Very nice and i would buy this cabinet again
customer_reviews.author: Barbecue Chip

customer_reviews.title: I love this, be careful where you place it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, be careful where you place it on the wall. I didn't measure correctly. so all my fault not the company. This is the same one as from the big bog hardware company for about $30 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ravedave

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but uneven doors.
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer mentioned- It is a pretty cabinet but the doors are uneven enough to notice. Frustrating. Also the first time it came the glass doors were shattered but they replaced it right away.
customer_reviews.author: JustBCuz

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet -Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks nice in my bathroom. I like the adjustable shelves and the textured glass adds interest.I have tall ceilings so I bought two and hung them together as if stacked . The added storage is exactly what my bathroom needed.
customer_reviews.author: amazaddict

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Needed more storage above my computer desk. This was very easy to assemble and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Freddy Man

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Decent amount of space
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Decent amount of space. Easy to assemble. The only bad part are the label stickers on parts. They just don't come off without leaving gunk behind.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to room
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and it looks nice. Easy to hang too. Will buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: bdd

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and useful. I hung it over my toilet. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sort of. Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: This actual product is nice, but a bit on the cheap side. Mine arrived with missing pieces, and there is (literally) no contact for this seller. So it's nice, but yours might arrive without pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ange Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Was nice but I got an extra cabinet that matched bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Was nice but I got an extra cabinet that matched bathroom that I didn't realize..... had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the product - manufacture was great - everything ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the product - manufacture was great - everything that should align aligned - even the knobs and bottom of the door alignment was perfect - high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Mickey P.

customer_reviews.title: Challenge to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product was a bit challenging to assemble and when all put together my doors ended up not sitting evenly. It could be my fault with how I put it together. I did appreciate that they added a bag of extra parts in the packaging. Overall I like the looks and function of this product but like I said a bit challenging and time consuming to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lucht

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom cabinet is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cabinet and it looks very expensive. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Great storage cabinet for bathroom products above the toilet. A great space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A

customer_reviews.title: Drugs need homes too
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy setup and install. Looks great on our wall in the bathroom and has ample space for your OTC drug collection.
customer_reviews.author: LtMajorBones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bathroom above the toilet, next to shower,easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SJL

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful. Nicely made and the directions to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. Nicely made and the directions to put it together are perfect. This is the first assembly my husband and I didn't argue over. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet, no damage upon arrival. Took about 25 minuets to assemble. Sits on bathroom counter top just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tenntex1

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the picture. The instructions were fairly straight forward. Not hard to assemble or hang. My mother loves it in her bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: catseverywhere

customer_reviews.title: everything else was pretty easy. I use it on the floor as ...
customer_reviews.text: it was hard to put the doors on. everything else was pretty easy. I use it on the floor as im in an apartment. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lady g

customer_reviews.title: Great bang-for-your-buck
customer_reviews.text: Overall the unit is nice. The glass doors look good, and the inside looks great. The door knobs are sub-par, plan to replace them, but that's very easy and cheap to do at any big-box store.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and sturdy. I like the glass doors and the spacious size.
customer_reviews.author: James Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is just a beautiful cabinet for an inexpensive amount! It really dresses up a small bathroom very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Doc55

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great cabinet! We hung it over the toilet. It is able to store bath towels and toilet paper. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging. No parts phone number.
customer_reviews.text: just opened up the package to put it together and found one of the glass doors had broken. I looked st the instructions and though there are instructions for calling parts and questions there is no phone number. Poor packaging and the lack of phone number to call leaves the whole thing suspect. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Metesh

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cabinet. Difficult to put together but worth the effort. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maralyn D. Hill Bates

customer_reviews.title: Easy instruction ...very happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect size. Easy instructions ..I did most of the building myself. Only needed help when it came to the doors. Added a bonus to my wall cabinet by spray painting the back board a light sage green! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Easy to assemble and hang
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Easy to assemble and hang. Looks very nice in our office bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Guipi Boy

customer_reviews.title: Doors are light and swing open and close fast!
customer_reviews.text: After installing it looks very nice but is also pretty cheaply made. The doors are light and swing open really fast without any stops so be careful denting the walls next to it if you have a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: beta1007

product_meta.title: Elegant Home Fashions Chesterfield Wall Cabinet with Two Glass Doors
product_meta.description: The Chesterfield Wall Cabinet features two waffle textured glass panel doors in an espresso finish. The cabinet classic design offers ample storage. The cabinet features three fixed shelves that are ideal for storing items. The double plated door knobs add a charming touch. This cabinet comes with assembly hardware.
feature_bullets: Elite, windowed medicine cabinet provides enclosed shelving
Sturdy engineered-wood construction; warm espresso finish
Waffle-pattern glass door pulls open with double-plated knob
Angular top molding and modern lines; minimal assembly required
Shelf Dimensions - Interior: 19.75” W x 5.75” D x 24.5” H; Adjustable shelf: 19.75” W x 5.75” D x 7” H, each can adjustable about 2.25” up or down
Door magnet and hinges are pre-hung
Maximum Shelf Capacity: 10 lb. per shelf with properly installed anchors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars319 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
